resources.string:
Hard-working, enthusiastic Computer Science student willing to learn and improve skills in software development. 

Bringing forth a positive work ethic and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively. 

Seeking a position where I can maximize my professional experience and build a career. 

I have strong analytical skills, I am super hard working, willing to learn and attentive to details. 

Furthermore, I’m a person with strong soft skills. 

I create pleasant working environment as it’s highly important for me to have nice atmosphere in my workplace.
